Description: Fragment of flattened handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora, with gradual curve. Button stamp, dotted centre. Greek inscription. Clay fine pink-buff.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary 1884-5 (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 132,17. Name Polycharmos. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0922.47.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0570)
